title: US Air Force Orders 29 Additional F110-GE-129 Engines to Power F-15EX Aircraft
content: General Electric Co., GE Edison Works, Cincinnati, Ohio, has been awarded a $1,579,662,187 firm-fixed-price contract including all options for the F-15EX Lots 2+ propulsion system procurement. This contract provides for 29 F110-GE-129 engines (installs and spares) for the F-15EX fleet. The contract also provides seven option lots for a most probable quantity of 329 total engines if all options are exercised. Work will be performed in Cincinnati, Ohio; and San Antonio, Texas, and is expected to be completed by June 30, 2031. This award is the result of a competitive source selection in which two offers were received. Fiscal 2021 aircraft procurement funds in the amount of $136,564,318 will be obligated at the time of award. Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Wright Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity (FA8626-22-C-0002). There is known congressional interest pertaining to this acquisition. Source: Source
related_organization: ['General Electric', '4th Fighter Wing', 'Air Force Life Cycle Management Center']
chinese_title: 美国空军额外订购29台F110-GE-129发动机为F-15EX飞机提供动力
chinese_content: 位于俄亥俄州辛辛那提市的通用电气公司（GE Edison Works）已获得一份1579662187美元的固定价格合同，包括F-15EX标段2+推进系统采购的所有选项。本合同为F-15EX机队提供29台F110-GE-129发动机（安装和备件）。合同还提供了七个选项批次，如果所有选项均已执行，则最可能的数量为329台发动机。工作将在俄亥俄州辛辛那提市进行；和德克萨斯州圣安东尼奥市，预计于2031年6月30日完工。该奖项是竞争性来源选择的结果，其中收到了两份报价。2021财年飞机采购资金136564318美元将在授予时承付。俄亥俄州Wright Patterson空军基地空军生命周期管理中心是合同活动（FA8626-22-C-0002）。已知国会对此次收购感兴趣。资料来源：资料来源

title: US Navy Selects 57mm Mk 110 Naval Gun for Constellation Class Frigates
content: BAE Systems has received a $26 million contract to equip the U.S. Navy’s Constellation class frigates with the fully-automatic 57mm Mk 110 naval gun.The contract, awarded earlier this month, includes engineering support and calls for two Mk 110s for the USS Constellation (FFG 62) and USS Congress (FFG 63). The new Constellation class of multi-mission guided-missile frigates is designed to operate in blue water and in the littorals, for an increased forward naval presence.The Mk 110 gun system, known internationally as the Bofors 57 Mk 3, is the deck gun of choice for the Constellation class. It is a multi-mission, medium-caliber shipboard weapon, effective against air, surface, or ground threats without requiring multiple round types. The system is capable of firing up to 220 rounds per minute at an effective range of more than nine nautical miles using BAE Systems’ six-mode programmable, pre-fragmented, and proximity-fused (3P) ammunition.“The selection of the Mk 110 for the U.S. Navy’s Constellation class frigates signifies confidence in the gun system and its ability to meet current and future needs in shipboard defense,” said Brent Butcher, vice president of the weapon systems product line at BAE Systems “The Mk 110 gun system provides this next-generation frigate with the continued performance that our surface fleet has come to expect from its intermediate caliber guns.”This contract also includes providing a Mk 110 system to the U.S. Coast Guard’s third Argus Class Offshore Patrol Cutter, USCGC Ingham. Deliveries are expected to begin in 2023 under the contract with Naval Sea Systems Command Integrated Warfare Systems 3C (NAVSEA IWS). The 57mm Mk 110 is currently in service on the Navy’s Littoral Combat Ship and the U.S. Coast Guard’s National Security Cutter. To date, BAE Systems is providing 39 Mk 110 guns to the Navy and 15 to the Coast Guard. Worldwide, 103 Mk 110/57 Mk 3 naval gun systems are under contract with nine nations. Source: 57mm Mk 110 selected for U.S. Navy's new Constellation-class frigates
chinese_title: 美国海军为星座级护卫舰选择57毫米Mk 110舰炮
chinese_content: 英国宇航系统公司（BAE Systems）已收到一份价值2600万美元的合同，为美国海军的星座级护卫舰配备全自动57毫米Mk 110舰炮。该合同于本月早些时候授予，包括工程支持，并要求为美国海军星座号（FFG 62）和美国国会号（FFG 63）提供两架Mk 110。新的星座级多任务导弹护卫舰设计用于在蓝色水域和沿海地区作战，以增加海军前沿存在。Mk 110火炮系统，国际上称为Bofors 57 Mk 3，是星座级的首选甲板火炮。它是一种多任务、中口径舰载武器，可有效对抗空中、地面或地面威胁，无需多发子弹。该系统能够使用BAE Systems的六模式可编程、预碎片化和近距离融合（3P）弹药，在超过9海里的有效射程内每分钟发射220发子弹。BAE系统公司武器系统产品线副总裁布伦特·布彻（Brent Butcher）说：“美国海军星座级护卫舰选用Mk 110标志着对火炮系统的信心及其满足当前和未来舰载防御需求的能力。”“Mk 110火炮系统为这艘新一代护卫舰提供了我们的水面舰队所期望的中等口径火炮的持续性能。”该合同还包括向美国海岸警卫队第三艘阿格斯级海上巡逻艇USCG Ingham提供Mk 110系统。根据与海军海洋系统司令部综合作战系统3C（NAVSEA IWS）签订的合同，预计将于2023年开始交付。57毫米Mk 110目前在海军沿海战斗舰和美国海岸警卫队的国家安全切割器上服役。到目前为止，BAE系统公司向海军提供39门Mk 110火炮，向海岸警卫队提供15门。在全球范围内，103门Mk 110/57 Mk 3舰炮系统与9个国家签订了合同。来源：美国海军选择57毫米Mk 110y的新型星座级护卫舰

title: US Air Force Awards Raytheon Cobra King Radar Maintenance Contract Through 2031
content: Raytheon Intelligence & Space, Dulles, Virginia, has awarded a $340,000,000 firm-fixed-price, cost-reimbursable, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for mobile sensors operations and maintenance services of the Cobra King radar system. Work will be performed at Patrick Space Force Base, Florida, and outside continental U.S. locations, and is expected to be completed by Oct. 31, 2031. This award is the result of a competitive acquisition in which one offer was received. Fiscal 2022 operations and maintenance funds in the amount of $17,699,700 are being obligated at the time of award. Acquisition Management and Integration Center, Patrick Space Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity (FA7022-22-D-0001). Source: Source
chinese_title: 美国空军授予雷神眼镜蛇王雷达维修合同至2031年
chinese_content: 弗吉尼亚州杜勒斯的雷声情报与空间公司已授予一份价值3400000000美元的固定价格、可补偿成本、无限期交付/无限期数量合同，用于眼镜王蛇雷达系统的移动传感器操作和维护服务。这项工作将在佛罗里达州帕特里克航天部队基地和美国大陆以外的地点进行，预计将于2031年10月31日完成。该奖项是一项竞争性收购的结果，该收购中收到了一份报价。2022财年运营和维护基金金额为17699700美元，在授予时已承付。佛罗里达州帕特里克航天部队基地采办管理与集成中心是合同活动（FA7022-22-D-0001）。资料来源：资料来源

title: GA-EMS and Boeing to Develop High Energy Laser Weapon System for US Army
content: Laser Weapon System Prototype for U.S. ArmySAN DIEGO, 25 Oct 2021 - A General Atomics Electromagnetic Systems (GA-EMS) and Boeing [NYSE: BA] team has been awarded a U.S. Army Rapid Capabilities and Critical Technologies Office (RCCTO) contract to develop a 300kW-class solid state Distributed Gain High Energy Laser Weapon System.  Delivery will be a 300 kW-class distributed gain laser with an integrated Boeing beam director.  The objective of this contract is a demonstration of the design. “The high power, compact laser weapon subsystem prototype that GA-EMS will deliver under this contract will produce a lethal output greater than anything fielded to date,” said Scott Forney, president of GA-EMS. “This technology represents a leap-ahead capability for air and missile defense that is necessary to support the Army’s modernization efforts and defeat next-generation threats in a multi-domain battlespace.”The partnership combines both companies’ expertise in Directed Energy to deliver best-in-class, combat-ready protection for the warfighter with unmatched speed, performance, safety and affordability. Specifically, the system will leverage GA-EMS’ scalable Distributed Gain Laser technology with Boeing’s beam director and precision acquisition, tracking and pointing software to provide a complete demonstrator with sophisticated laser and beam control.Dr. Michael Perry, vice president for lasers and advanced sensors at GA-EMS describes the laser as “a packaged version of the 7th Generation of our Distributed Gain Design already demonstrated. The laser system employs two Gen 7 laser heads in a very compact and lightweight package. Recent architectural improvements have enabled our single-beam DG Lasers to achieve comparable beam quality to fiber lasers in a very simple design without the need for beam combination,”“We’re excited to take the next step in delivering this critical capability to the Army,” said Cindy Gruensfelder, vice president and general manager of Boeing’s Missile and Weapon Systems division. “Our joint offering will leverage proven, deployed technologies to provide an industry-leading solution on an accelerated timeline.” Source: GA-EMS and Boeing Team to Develop 300kW-class HELWS Prototype for US Army
chinese_title: GA-EMS和波音公司将为美军开发高能激光武器系统
chinese_content: 美国ArmySAN DIEGO的激光武器系统原型，2021年10月25日-通用原子电磁系统（GA-EMS）和波音[NYSE:BA]团队已获得美国陆军快速能力和关键技术办公室（RCCTO）的合同，以开发300kW级固态分布式增益高能激光武器系统。交付的将是一台300千瓦级分布式增益激光器，带有一个集成的波音光束控制器。本合同的目的是演示设计。GA-EMS总裁斯科特·福尼（Scott Forney）说：“GA-EMS根据本合同交付的高功率、紧凑型激光武器子系统原型将产生比迄今为止任何装备都大的致命输出。”。“这项技术代表了空中和导弹防御的跨越式能力，这是支持陆军现代化努力和在多领域作战空间中击败下一代威胁所必需的。”该合作伙伴关系结合了两家公司在定向能方面的专业知识，以提供一流的，以无与伦比的速度、性能、安全性和经济性为作战人员提供战备防护。具体而言，该系统将利用GA-EMS的可扩展分布式增益激光技术、波音的光束控制器和精密采集、跟踪和指向软件，提供一个完整的演示器，具有先进的激光和光束控制。Dr。GA-EMS负责激光和高级传感器的副总裁迈克尔·佩里（Michael Perry）将激光描述为“我们已经展示了第7代分布式增益设计的封装版本。激光系统采用了两个第7代激光头，封装非常紧凑和轻巧。最近的结构改进使我们的单光束DG激光器能够在没有ne的情况下，以非常简单的设计实现与光纤激光器相当的光束质量波音公司导弹和武器系统部副总裁兼总经理辛迪·格伦斯菲尔德（Cindy Gruensfelder）表示：“我们很高兴为陆军提供这一关键能力迈出下一步。”。“我们的联合产品将利用经验证、已部署的技术，在加速的时间轴上提供业界领先的解决方案。”来源：GA-EMS和波音团队将为美国陆军开发300kW级直升机原型

title: US Marine Corps to Procure 18 MQ-9A Reaper Unmanned Aircraft Systems
content: Previously Leased UAS Have Been Transferred to USMC OwnershipSAN DIEGO – 20 October 2021 – General Atomics Aeronautical Systems, Inc. (GA-ASI) completed the transfer of two MQ-9A Reaper Block 5 Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) to the U.S. Marine Corps on October 15, 2021. The two aircraft have been operated by the USMC since 2018 under a Company Owned/Company Operated (COCO) lease agreement in support of an Urgent Operational Need. The Reapers represent the first increment of the Marine Air-Ground Task Force (MAGTF) Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS) Expeditionary (MUX) Program of Record (POR). The transfer of aircraft includes two Ground Control Stations and associated support equipment.The two COCO MQ-9As, using remote split operations from Marine Corps Air Station Yuma, have been in operation for the USMC as part of a lease agreement between GA-ASI and Naval Air Systems Command, accruing over 12,000 flight hours supporting operations in the Middle East and informing the requirements and expectations for the MUX POR. The MUX POR will include an additional 16 new MQ-9As, which the Marine Corps will begin procuring in 2022 to support an Early Operational Capability in 2023 and Initial Operating Capability in the U.S. Indo-Pacific Command (INDOPACOM) by 2025.“The Marine Corps leveraged the leased aircraft to better understand and articulate the needs of the MUX program, while simultaneously supporting the forward-deployed warfighter,” said GA-ASI President David R. Alexander. “It was a great example of how a customer can ‘try before you buy’ our aircraft. Now they’ve seen firsthand how a persistent ISR platform, like the MQ-9A, can support the Marine Corps’ need for long-range sensing in the Pacific as a part of the Commandant’s Force Design Initiative.”   With unmatched operational flexibility, MQ-9A Block 5 has endurance of over 26 hours, speeds of 220 KTAS and can operate up to 45,000 feet. It has a 3,850-pound (1,746 kilogram) payload capacity that includes 3,000 pounds (1,361 kilograms) of external stores. It provides a long-endurance, persistent surveillance capability with Full-Motion Video and Synthetic Aperture Radar. An extremely reliable aircraft, MQ-9A Block 5 is equipped with a fault-tolerant flight control system and triple redundant avionics system architecture. It is engineered to meet and exceed manned aircraft reliability standards. Source: USMC Acquires 2 MQ-9A Reapers
related_organization: ['General Atomics', 'General Atomics Aeronautical Systems', 'Naval Air Systems Command', 'U.S. Indo-Pacific Command', 'Marine Corps Air Station Yuma']
chinese_title: 美国海军陆战队将采购18架MQ-9A“收割者”无人机系统
chinese_content: 此前租赁的无人机已转让给美国海军陆战队所有人桑·迭戈——2021年10月20日——通用原子航空系统公司（GA-ASI）于2021年10月15日完成了两个MQ-9A“收割者”Block 5无人机系统（UAS）向美国海军陆战队的转让。这两架飞机自2018年起由美国海军陆战队根据公司所有/公司运营（COCO）租赁协议运营，以满足紧急运营需求。收割者代表了海军陆战队空地特遣部队（MAGTF）无人机系统（UAS）远征（MUX）记录项目（POR）的第一个增量。飞机的转移包括两个地面控制站和相关的支持设备。两个COCO MQ-9A使用海军陆战队尤马航空站的远程分离操作，作为GA-ASI和海军航空系统司令部之间租赁协议的一部分，已经为USMC运行，在中东支持12000个飞行小时，支持MUX POR的要求和期望。MUX POR将包括另外16个新的MQ-9A，海军陆战队将于2022年开始采购，以支持2023年的早期作战能力和2025年美国印太司令部（INDOPACOM）的初始作战能力。“海军陆战队利用租赁的飞机更好地理解和表达MUX计划的需求，同时支持前沿部署的作战人员，”GA-ASI总裁大卫·R·亚历山大（David R.Alexander）说。“这是一个很好的例子，说明了客户可以在购买我们的飞机之前‘试一试’。现在，他们亲眼看到了像MQ-9A这样的持久ISR平台如何能够支持海军陆战队在太平洋的远程传感需求，作为指挥官部队设计计划的一部分。”MQ-9A Block 5具有无与伦比的操作灵活性，其耐久性超过26小时，速度为220千塔斯，可运行45000英尺。其有效载荷容量为3850磅（1746千克），包括3000磅（1361千克）外部存储。它通过全动态视频和合成孔径雷达提供长时间、持久的监视能力。MQ-9A Block 5是一种非常可靠的飞机，配备了容错飞行控制系统和三重冗余航空电子系统体系结构。其设计旨在满足并超过载人飞机的可靠性资料来源：美国海军陆战队收购了2架MQ-9A收割机

title: US Army Lockheed Martin PrSM Conducts Successful Flight Test Setting New Longest Range
content: DALLAS, October 14, 2021 – Lockheed Martin’s (NYSE: LMT) Precision Strike Missile (PrSM) completed its longest flight to date, exceeding maximum threshold, with the U.S. Army yesterday at Vandenberg Space Force Base (VSFB), California. This marks the fifth consecutive successful flight test for the missile.Firing from a High Mobility Artillery Rocket Systems (HIMARS) launcher, the PrSM flew an extended range mission over the Pacific Ocean.“The Precision Strike Missile continues to validate range and performance requirements,” said Paula Hartley, vice president of Tactical Missiles at Lockheed Martin Missiles and Fire Control. “Achieving this long-range milestone for the baseline missile demonstrates PrSM’s capability to meet our customer’s modernization priorities on a rapid timeline.”The success comes on the heels of two U.S. Army contract awards issued in September for Early Operational Capability (EOC) production and Engineering and Manufacturing Development (EMD) advancing the missile to the next phase of the PrSM program. Lockheed Martin is working alongside the U.S. Army to optimize this next-gen system for the future – in everything from production to enhanced capabilities. Implementing digital tools such as augmented reality, advanced modeling and sim, machine learning/data analytics, and software factory to streamline efforts has helped accelerate PrSM’s development program with speed, agility and efficiency.“We are also working closely with our Army partners to develop and integrate future incremental  capabilities,” said Hartley.  The flight is the second of three demonstrations taking place this year as part of the Enhanced Technology Maturation and Risk Reduction (ETMRR) phase of the development program. The next flight is scheduled this fall as part of the U.S. Army’s Project Convergence 21.  The test missile was produced at Lockheed Martin’s new Long Range Precision Fires facility in Camden, Arkansas. This facility is a part of a $142 million investment to expand and enhance Lockheed Martin’s Precision Fires center of excellence. All missile and pod integration efforts will now be occurring in this adaptable, future-focused facility that is prepared to evolve with future warfighter needs.For more than 40 years, Lockheed Martin Missiles and Fire Control has been the leading designer and manufacturer of long-range, surface-to-surface precision strike solutions, providing highly reliable, combat-proven systems such as the Multiple Launch Rocket System (MLRS), HIMARS, Army Tactical Missile System (ATACMS) and Guided MLRS (GMLRS) to domestic and international customers. Source: U.S. Army Breaks New Ground As Lockheed Martin’s PrSM Completes Record-Setting Flight
related_organization: ['Fire Control', 'Lockheed Martin', 'Lockheed Martin Missiles', 'United States Army']
chinese_title: 美国陆军洛克希德·马丁公司PrSM成功进行飞行试验，设定了新的最远距离
chinese_content: 达拉斯，2021年10月14日——洛克希德·马丁公司（NYSE:LMT）的精确打击导弹（PrSM）完成了迄今为止最长的飞行，超过了最大限度，美国陆军昨天在加利福尼亚州范登堡航天基地（VSFB）完成了飞行。这标志着该导弹连续第五次成功试飞。PrSM从高机动火炮火箭系统（HIMARS）发射器发射，在太平洋上空执行远程任务。“精确打击导弹继续验证射程和性能要求，”Paula Hartley说，洛克希德·马丁公司负责战术导弹和火力控制的副总裁。“实现基线导弹的这一远程里程碑表明，PrSM有能力在快速的时间内满足客户的现代化优先事项。”这一成功是继9月发布的两份美国陆军早期作战能力（EOC）合同之后取得的生产、工程和制造开发（EMD）将导弹推进到PrSM计划的下一阶段。洛克希德·马丁公司正在与美国陆军合作，为未来优化这一新一代系统——从生产到增强能力的各个方面。实施数字工具，如增强现实、高级建模和sim、机器学习/数据分析和软件工厂，以简化工作，有助于加快PrSM的开发计划，提高速度、灵活性和效率。哈特利说：“我们还与我们的陆军合作伙伴密切合作，开发和整合未来的增量能力。”这次飞行是今年进行的三次演示中的第二次，作为增强技术成熟度和降低风险（ETMRR）的一部分开发计划的一个阶段。下一次飞行计划在今年秋天进行，作为美国陆军“收敛21”项目的一部分。试验导弹是在位于阿肯色州卡姆登的洛克希德·马丁公司新的远程精确火力设施中生产的。该设施是1.42亿美元投资的一部分，用于扩大和增强洛克希德·马丁公司的精确火力res卓越中心。所有导弹和吊舱集成工作现在都将在这一适应性强、面向未来的设施中进行，该设施准备随着未来作战人员的需求而发展。40多年来，洛克希德·马丁导弹和火控公司一直是远程、地对地精确打击的领先设计师和制造商e解决方案，为国内外客户提供高度可靠、经作战验证的系统，如多管火箭系统（MLRS）、HIMARS、陆军战术导弹系统（ATACMS）和制导多管火箭系统（GMLRS）。来源：美国陆军在洛克希德·马丁公司的PrSM完成创纪录的飞行后开辟了新天地
